comment.note: The Comedy Pet Photography Awards 2020 Elke Vogelsang 31137 Hildesheim Germany Phone: Email: Title: "SQUIRRELLL!!!" Description: Noodles was rescued from a Spanish kill-shelter and brought to Germany, where she joined our family when she was eight months old. She is a Spanish sighthound (Galgo EspaÃ±ol) mix, 13 years old now (a bit younger in this picture) and still acting like a pup. She is the clown, sometimes overly motivated and clumsy, the eager-beaver, curious, friendly, open-minded, extremely funny if not unintentionally comic sometimes. Animal: Noodles, Spanish rescue mix Location of shot: Hildesheim, Germany
